item.title: 铜价下跌，因创纪录高价令中国需求承压
item.description: 铜价随多数基本金属下跌，因投资者权衡中国——全球最大买家——在价格创下纪录后需求萎缩的程度。【原文：Copper fell with most base metals, as investors weighed the scope for demand destruction in top buyer China after prices hit a record.】

item.title: 花旗因美欧格陵兰岛争端下调欧洲股市评级
item.description: 花旗集团时隔一年多首次下调欧洲股票评级，理由是布鲁塞尔与华盛顿之间因特朗普总统推动收购格陵兰岛而恶化的关系。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has downgraded European equities for the first time in over a year, citing worsening relations between Brussels and Washington over President Donald Trump’s push to seize Greenland.】

item.title: RBC称必和必拓仍掌握铁矿石定价权，尽管存在折扣
item.description: 据加拿大皇家银行资本市场分析，必和必拓集团在中方压力下实施的铁矿石价格折扣仅属"表面现象、暂时性且存在经济限制"，并不反映这家矿业巨头定价能力的衰退。【原文：BHP Group’s iron ore discounts following Chinese pressure are “optical, temporary and economically bounded” and don’t reflect a decline in the mining giant’s pricing power, according to RBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 江西铜业计划发行36亿美元债券为扩张融资
item.description: 江西铜业公司——中国领先的冶炼企业——表示计划发行总额不超过250亿元人民币（约合36亿美元）的债券，用于矿业扩张。此前铜价已攀升至历史高位。【原文：Jiangxi Copper Co., a leading Chinese smelter, said it planned to issue up to 25 billion yuan ($3.6 billion) of bonds that could fund an expansion of mining after prices rallied to a record.】

item.title: 印度散户最青睐的股票表现严重滞后。
item.description: 自2024年6月以来，此类股票组合一直处于亏损状态：科塔克【原文：A portfolio of such stocks has delivered negative returns since June 2024: Kotak】

item.title: 中国大豆采购量达1200万吨以履行对美承诺
item.description: 过去三个月，中国已采购约1200万吨美国大豆，消除了备受关注的贸易障碍，并兑现了特朗普政府去年11月提出的关键承诺。【原文：China has purchased roughly 12 million tons of US soybeans in the last three months, clearing a closely watched trade hurdle and meeting a key pledge outlined by the Trump administration in November.】

item.title: 高盛称丰田工业更高收购报价支撑市场
item.description: 高盛表示，丰田工业公司近期上调收购要约价格的举措将提振外国投资者对日本股票的信心，因该举动体现了日本市场对加强少数股东保护的必要性。【原文：Goldman Sachs said the recent upward revision to Toyota Industries Corp.’s tender offer price will boost foreign investors’ confidence in Japanese equities, as it recognizes the need for stronger protection for minority shareholders in Japan.】

item.title: 中国加深对PDD的调查，此前该公司与监管机构发生肢体冲突
item.description: 知情人士透露，在PDD控股公司员工与监管人员发生肢体冲突后，中国已扩大对该公司的调查范围。近几周来，中国已向该公司上海总部派遣了来自多个部门的逾百名调查人员。【原文：China has broadened a probe into PDD Holdings Inc. after its employees exchanged blows with regulators, dispatching over 100 investigators from various agencies to the company’s Shanghai headquarters in recent weeks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾在艰难市场中发售一年来首只美元债券
item.description: 菲律宾时隔一年再度发行美元债券，在特朗普总统重启美欧贸易战导致美国国债收益率攀升、风险资产承压的动荡市场中勇敢前行。【原文：The Philippines started marketing its first dollar notes in a year, braving rocky markets after President Donald Trump’s revival of the trade war between the US and Europe pushed Treasury yields higher and hit risk assets.】

item.title: 印尼盾因央行独立性问题跌至历史新低
item.description: 印尼盾汇率跌至历史最低点，因市场对央行独立性的担忧再度升温，加剧了持续存在的财政忧虑。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah declined to its weakest level in history as resurging concerns over the central bank’s autonomy add to persistent fiscal worries.】

item.title: 波普艺术公司股价飙升，交易员欢呼其自2024年以来首次回购
item.description: 波普艺术国际集团有限公司股价创五个月来最大涨幅，这家中国玩具制造商自2024年以来首次实施股票回购，提振了投资者信心。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. shares soared the most in five months after the Chinese toymaker’s first share buyback since 2024 boosted investor confidence.】

item.title: 泰国前总理阿披实谋求复出，欲以反诈骗专家身份成为政治造王者
item.description: 泰国前领导人阿披实·维乍集瓦预计将在下月大选后任何试图执政的联盟中扮演造王者角色，他提出"清洁政治"议程以解决系统性腐败问题并瓦解网络诈骗活动。【原文：Former Thai leader Abhisit Vejjajiva expects to play a kingmaker’s role in any coalition that seeks to rule the Southeast Asian nation after next month’s election, pitching an agenda of “clean politics” to tackle systemic corruption and dismantle cyber scam operations.】

item.title: 基金称印度央行需加大购债力度以抑制收益率
item.description: 市场参与者表示，由于四次降息和创纪录的债务购买仍未能缓解高企的收益率，印度央行需要向银行体系注入更多流动性。【原文：India’s central bank will need to pump significantly more liquidity into the banking system, as four interest-rate cuts and record debt purchases have yet to ease elevated yields, market participants said.】

item.title: 关税担忧笼罩市场 美国国债加入全球债券抛售潮
item.description: 美国国债加入全球债券抛售行列，因美国对格陵兰岛征收关税的威胁削弱了对美国资产的需求，并加剧了市场对华盛顿长期财政状况的担忧。【原文：Treasuries joined a selloff in global bonds as the threat of US tariffs relating to Greenland undermined demand for American assets and added to concerns about Washington’s long-term fiscal position.】

item.title: 日本40年期国债收益率自2007年发行以来首次触及4%
item.description: 日本40年期国债收益率升至4%，创下该债券2007年发行以来的最高水平，也是该国三十多年来所有期限主权债务中首次突破4%。【原文：Japan’s 40-year bond yield hit 4%, the highest since its debut in 2007 and a first for any maturity of the nation’s sovereign debt in more than three decades.】

item.title: 盐野义制药斥资21亿美元增持维艾维健康股权
item.description: 日本制药公司盐野义制药宣布将投资21亿美元，将其在维艾维健康公司的持股比例提高至21.7%，从而成为这家艾滋病药物的生产商的关联公司。【原文：Japanese pharmaceutical company Shionogi & Co. said it will invest $2.1 billion to raise its stake in ViiV Healthcare to 21.7%, making it an affiliate of the HIV drugmaker.】

item.title: 英国议员呼吁对银行进行人工智能压力测试，因风险日益加剧
item.description: 英国议员警告称，该国金融监管机构应开始对人工智能带来的风险进行压力测试，因为当前观望的态度使公众和经济面临遭受"严重损害"的风险。【原文：Britain’s financial regulators should start stress-testing the risks posed by artificial intelligence because their current wait-and-see approach leaves the public and economy in danger of “serious harm,” a group of lawmakers warned.】

item.title: 花旗集团认为日元疲软或致2026年日本央行三次加息
item.description: 花旗集团日本市场主管表示，若日元持续走弱，日本央行今年可能加息三次，将利率水平提升至当前的两倍。【原文：The Bank of Japan will potentially raise interest rates three times this year to double the current level if the yen’s weakness persists, according to Citigroup Inc.’s markets head for the country.】

item.title: 中国玉兰债券销售热潮凸显中欧关系深化
item.description: 中国信贷市场的一个角落正释放出该国与欧洲关系日益紧密的信号——通过上海清算所及其布鲁塞尔对口机构建立的机制，债券发行量创下历史新高。【原文：A corner of China’s credit market is signaling the country’s closer ties with Europe, with a record amount of bonds issued via a mechanism established by the Shanghai Clearing House and its counterpart in Brussels.】

item.title: 日本央行料维持利率不变，日元交易员关注干预风险
item.description: 日本央行周五料将维持基准利率不变，这将对日元提供有限的即时支撑——同时令交易员高度警惕政府可能在当日日元下跌时采取外汇干预措施。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to keep its benchmark rate unchanged Friday, offering little immediate support for the yen — and keeping traders on high alert for potential foreign exchange intervention by the government as early as the same day if the currency slides.】

item.title: 油价持稳，格陵兰危机与供应过剩担忧成焦点
item.description: 油价持稳，交易员密切关注美国试图控制格陵兰岛的后续影响，同时担忧全球供应过剩问题。【原文：Oil steadied as traders tracked the fallout from the US push to take control of Greenland, and concerns about a global surplus.】

item.title: 银价创历史新高，美欧因格陵兰问题持续对峙
item.description: 银价创下历史新高，金价逼近历史峰值。特朗普总统推动收购格陵兰岛的举动加剧了对美欧贸易战的担忧，令市场持续承压。【原文：Silver hit a record high and gold traded near an all-time peak as President Donald Trump’s push to take over Greenland fueled fears of a US-Europe trade war and kept markets on edge.】

item.title: 好莱坞下一个主要制片厂即将出售
item.description: 彼得·切尔宁正就出售其独立制片公司进行谈判【原文：Peter Chernin is in talks to sell his independent production company】

item.title: MSCI规则调整或将引发印尼股市20亿美元资金撤离
item.description: 若明晟公司（MSCI Inc.）推进其指数编制方法的变更，未来数月全球基金可能从印尼股市撤资逾20亿美元，这凸显了市场对东南亚最大股市投资可行性的担忧。【原文：Global funds may withdraw more than $2 billion from Indonesian equities in coming months if MSCI Inc. proceeds with a change to its indexing methodology, underscoring concerns about the investability of Southeast Asia’s biggest stock market.】

item.title: 韩国交易所CEO预测KOSPI指数将达6000点，誓言清理"僵尸企业"
item.description: 韩国交易所首席执行官郑恩甫表示，随着该国持续推进提升股东回报率及吸引全球资本的举措，韩国股市的全球领先涨势有望延续。【原文：The world-beating rally in South Korean stocks is poised to extend as the nation presses ahead with efforts to improve shareholder returns and lure global capital, according to Jeong Eun Bo, chief executive officer at the Korea Exchange.】

item.title: 日本20年期国债发售令投资者忐忑不安
item.description: 在政府宣布对食品减税的计划引发市场震荡后，投资者正屏息以待周二日本20年期国债拍卖的结果。【原文：Investors are on tenterhooks ahead of an auction of 20-year Japanese sovereign bonds Tuesday after the government’s plans for tax relief on food jolted the market.】

item.title: 亚洲股市谨慎开局 关税争端持续升级：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘前小幅走低，因特朗普总统对格陵兰岛的关税威胁重燃贸易紧张局势，令投资者风险偏好承压。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for modest losses at the open as President Donald Trump’s tariff threats over Greenland revived trade tensions and weighed on investor appetite for risk.】

item.title: 必和必拓铁矿产量小幅上升，钾肥成本再度攀升
item.description: 全球最大矿业公司必和必拓集团第二季度铁矿石产量达6970万吨，同比增长5%，并重申了全年产量指导目标。【原文：BHP Group, the world’s largest miner, produced 69.7 million tons of iron ore in its second quarter, up 5% on the same period a year ago, and reaffirmed its annual production guidance.】

item.description:
尽管全球舆论对未经同意生成露骨照片的行为哗然，埃隆·马斯克仍持续淡化此事。【原文：

Despite global uproar over the generation of non-consensual explicit photos, Elon Musk has continued to downplay the issue.

item.title: 越南林氏家族成为焦点，党选出新领导层
item.description: 越南共产党最高领导人将于周二在河内举行的全国代表大会开幕式上亮相。在这个论坛上，这个快速发展的东南亚国家的执政党将批准一项新的五年发展计划。【原文：Vietnam’s Communist Party chief is set to take the stage Tuesday at the opening ceremony for the National Congress in Hanoi, a forum where the ruling party of the fast-growing Southeast Asian nation will sign off on a new five-year development plan.】
